item.title: A workshop on DAST and how to put it into your pipeline
item.description: About this session Adding DAST to CI/CD, Without Any Losing Friends Everyone wants to put tests into the release pipeline, but no one wants to wait hours for them to finish. In this talk we will discuss multiple options for adding dynamic application security testing (DAST) to your CI/CD, in ways that wonâ€™t compromise speed or results, such as limiting scope, using HAR files, using test subsets, etc. Then we will do it!
